structure.unit: SANITARIANS, WATER PLANT OPERATORS, AND WATER WELL CONSTRUCTION PRACTICES

law.text: The Kentucky Water Well Certification Board is established. The board shall recommend to the secretary administrative regulations to govern examinations; hearings to suspend, revoke or deny a certificate; and any other duties prescribed by KRS 223.405 to 223.460. The subject matter of such examinations shall include, in addition to any standardized section, testing for knowledge of local laws and regulations.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 215, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1984.
